notes.text:
This update for python-urllib3 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-26137: Fixed a CRLF injection via HTTP request method (bsc#1177120).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: urllib3 before 1.25.9 allows CRLF injection if the attacker controls the HTTP request method, as demonstrated by inserting CR and LF control characters in the first argument of putrequest(). NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2020-26116.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
